properties.entry: SELECT NO_TITLE , NO_CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N WHERE NO_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NO_CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT NO_NO , NO_TITLE , NO_CREATE_DATE , NO_COUNT , NO_STATUS FROM NOTICE N ORDER BY NO_CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NO_NO , NO_TITLE , NO_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
